q1.question: Can I cancel my booking?
q1.answer: Yes, you can cancel up to 24 hours before your booking start time for a full refund. Cancellations within 24 hours are subject to a 50% cancellation fee.

q2.question: What if I'm late?
q2.answer: Your booking time starts at the scheduled time. If you're running late, please contact us as soon as possible. Late arrivals do not extend your end time.

q3.question: Can I extend my time?
q3.answer: Yes, if the garage is available, you can extend your booking. Contact us or book an additional slot through the website.

q4.question: What vehicles fit in the garage?
q4.answer: The garage is 3m wide, 6m long, with a 2m gate height. It's suitable for most standard cars, SUVs, and small vans.

q5.question: Is electricity included?
q5.answer: Yes, 3A electricity is included in all bookings at no additional cost.

q6.question: Is the space heated?
q6.answer: Yes, the garage is heated to ensure comfortable working conditions year-round.

q7.question: How do I access the garage?
q7.answer: After payment confirmation, you'll receive an email with the gate code and detailed access instructions.

q8.question: Are tools available?
q8.answer: The garage does not include tools. Please bring your own equipment.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions

section1.title: Booking & Payment
section1.p1: All bookings must be made through our online booking system. Payment is required at the time of booking via Stripe secure checkout.
section1.p2: By completing a booking, you agree to pay the total amount displayed for the selected time period.
section1.p3: All prices are in EUR and include VAT where applicable.

section2.title: Cancellation & Refund Policy
section2.p1: Our cancellation policy is as follows:
section2.fullRefundText: Cancellations made 24 hours or more before the booking start time are eligible for a full refund.
section2.noRefundText: Bookings cancelled less than 24 hours before the start time are non-refundable. This includes no-shows.
section2.p2: To cancel your booking, please contact us immediately at info@garagerental.lv or +371 2000 0000.

section3.title: Access & Notifications
section3.p1: After successful payment, you will receive confirmation and access details through multiple channels:
section3.smsText: You will receive a short text message to your provided phone number containing the gate access code and key instructions.
section3.videoText: A link to a video walkthrough will be sent showing exactly how to find and access the garage location at Krustpils 31, Plavnieki, Riga.
section3.p2: Please ensure your phone number and email address are correct when booking. Access details are typically sent within 5 minutes of payment confirmation.

section4.title: Usage Rules
section4.intro: By using the garage, you agree to:
section4.rule1: Use the garage only during your booked time slot
section4.rule2: Keep the garage clean and tidy during use
section4.rule3: Not sublease or share access with unauthorized persons
section4.rule4: Not store hazardous materials or illegal substances
section4.rule5: Secure the garage properly when leaving
section4.rule6: Report any damage or issues immediately

section5.title: Liability & Insurance
section5.p1: You are responsible for your vehicle and belongings while using the garage. We recommend maintaining comprehensive insurance coverage.
section5.p2: The garage owner is not liable for theft, damage, or loss of vehicles, tools, or personal property.
section5.p3: You are liable for any damage caused to the garage or its equipment during your rental period.

section6.title: Duration & Extension
section6.p1: Your rental period begins at the start time specified in your booking and ends at the specified end time.
section6.p2: If you need to extend your booking, please contact us as soon as possible. Extensions are subject to availability and will be charged at the standard hourly rate.

terms.agreement: By completing a booking, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these Terms & Conditions.
